医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，在心脏骤停事件中很少使用公共除颤器自动体外除颤器 (AED) 是公共建筑中的常见资源，但一项新的分析表明，它们很少用于帮助心脏骤停的患者进行复苏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Public-defibrillators-rarely-used-during-cardiac-arrest-incidents-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Public-defibrillators-rarely-used-during-cardiac-arrest-incidents-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16b3ad47-e62d-4f50-a012-160b56da0c2b Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:58:42 -0400 Public defibrillators rarely used during cardiac arrest incidents, research shows
PROSPERITY 试验显示强化鸡蛋对胆固醇没有负面影响无论您喜欢单面鸡蛋、煮鸡蛋还是炒鸡蛋，许多人都会犹豫是否要吃鸡蛋，因为担心鸡蛋可能会提高胆固醇水平，对心脏健康不利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/PROSPERITY-trial-reveals-no-negative-cholesterol-impact-from-fortified-eggs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/PROSPERITY-trial-reveals-no-negative-cholesterol-impact-from-fortified-eggs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f2f238f-0a0c-4b32-a434-2a45bc198338 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:46:49 -0400 PROSPERITY trial reveals no negative cholesterol impact from fortified eggs
心理健康状况可能会加速年轻和中年女性的心血管风险人们普遍认为年轻女性患心脏病的风险较低，但新的研究敦促临床医生重新审视这一假设，特别是对于患有某些心理健康问题的女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Mental-health-conditions-could-accelerate-cardiovian-risk-in-young-and-middle-ged-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Mental-health-conditions-could-accelerate-cardiovian-risk-in-young-and-middle-ged-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f584c33b-c167-44e6-ad44-e1579f829d51 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:43:52 -0400 Mental health conditions could accelerate cardiovascular risk in young and middle-aged women
研究表明大量饮酒会增加年轻女性患心脏病的风险美国学院发表的一项研究发现，与饮酒量较少的女性相比，每周饮用八种或更多酒精饮料（平均每天超过一种）的年轻至中年女性患冠心病的可能性明显更高心脏病学年度科学会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Study-links-heavy-drinking-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-in-young-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Study-links-heavy-drinking-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-in-young-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5892786f-e00d-47bb-8700-48fe9daa3bee Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:40:41 -0400 Study links heavy drinking to increased heart disease risk in young women
基于智能手机的高质量步态分析新方法肯尼迪克里格研究所和约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员开发了一种新的、易于使用的方法来更有效地分析患者的行走能力和姿势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/New-smartphone-based-method-for-high-quality-gait-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/New-smartphone-based-method-for-high-quality-gait-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81038e19-3bcb-4b4a-9211-69d14ef8e73f Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:37:33 -0400 New smartphone-based method for high-quality gait analysis
人类乳腺细胞图谱揭示BRCA基因突变携带者早期变化剑桥大学的研究人员创建了世界上最大的人类乳腺细胞目录，揭示了 BRCA1 和 BRCA2 基因突变健康携带者的早期细胞变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Human-breast-cell-atlas-unveils-early-changes-in-BRCA-gene-mutation-carriers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Human-breast-cell-atlas-unveils-early-changes-in-BRCA-gene-mutation-carriers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=155d3efb-81bb-4d49-9d6b-4392a18f5cd4 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:29:15 -0400 Human breast cell atlas unveils early changes in BRCA gene mutation carriers
揭示基因调控在肺纤维化中的作用人们认为基因表达调节因子在从癌症到心脏病等疾病中发挥着巨大作用。但基因调控的变化究竟如何转化为疾病的生物学特性呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Unraveling-gene-regulations-role-in-pulmonary-太多纤维化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Unraveling-gene-regulations-role-in-pulmonary-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0308e6b3-5a8f-43e9-9065-90923b61b11c Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:20:05 -0400 Unraveling gene regulation's role in pulmonary fibrosis
研究首次揭示了突触发育背后的机制对突触蛋白在早期发育过程中如何变化的首次分析揭示了小鼠和狨猴之间的差异，以及患有自闭症谱系障碍的个体之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Research-offers-first-insights-into-the-mechanism-behind-synaptic-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Research-offers-first-insights-into-the-mechanism-behind-synaptic-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6db5435-376f-4661-997f-106052abee50 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:13:42 -0400 Research offers first insights into the mechanism behind synaptic development
AudioCure Pharma：新型化合物 AC102 可恢复临床前模型中噪声引起的听力损失新型化合物 AC102 的单次应用几乎可以完全恢复临床前模型中噪声引起的听力损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/AudioCure-Pharma-Novel-compound-AC102-restores-noise-induced-hearing-loss-in-preclinical-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/AudioCure-Pharma-Novel-compound-AC102-restores-noise-induced-hearing-loss-in-preclinical-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f31dea0-189e-4084-8fab-8ca6fc2463a8 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:09:36 -0400 AudioCure Pharma: Novel compound AC102 restores noise-induced hearing loss in preclinical models
研究表明，遗传和生活方式因素与大脑网络老化有关研究利用来自近 40,000 名英国生物银行参与者的数据来调查可改变的风险因素和遗传关联，强调了遗传和生活方式因素对对衰老、精神分裂症和阿尔茨海默病特别敏感的大脑网络的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Genetic-and-lifestyle-factors-linked-to-brain-network-aging-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Genetic-and-lifestyle-factors-linked-to-brain-network-aging-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fdbe581-1a1f-4a5a-9ebe-7dc1fa84e347 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Genetic and lifestyle factors linked to brain network aging, study reveals
